text: Willard Tobe Hooper (January 25, 1943 - August 26, 2017) was an American movie director, screenwriter, and producer. Hooper best known for his work in the horror movie genre; his most recognized movie include The Texas Chain Saw Massacre and Poltergeist.Tobe Hooper Biography (1943-) Stuart Heritage of The Guardian described The Texas Chain Saw Massacre as "one of the most influential films ever made".
